attributes.action: Free Trade with Europe should be FREE
attributes.background:
With an EU Trade Deficit of almost £24 billion in the last quarter any future free trade agreement with the EU must be just that, FREE. 

No financial contribution
No more unrestricted immigration
Just FREE Trade

rejection.details: The UK Government is not solely responsible for the final agreement with the EU. You could start a new petition asking the Government to seek to achieve this aim in negotiation.
